description:
In this course you will enhance the learning of BPMN through the use of a tool that is agile and easy to use, facilitates designing, diagramming, documenting and publishing of processes using BPMN international standards.
After taking this course you will master techniques and criteria for designing of processes, applying best practices and BPMN standards, enabling you to identify, understand and learn the concepts of BPMN for process design. 

The included software tool is free to use for diagramming and testing of processes.

You should approach this course with maximum dedication as it will test your abilities with included exercises and quizzes.
title: Business Process Modeling 2.0
